Linear Threshold module¶

The Linear Threshold Model class¶

class python.linear_threshold.LinearThresholdModel(g, seeds)[source]¶

Bases: object

Linear Threshold model class

Parameters

  • g (Graph) – graph on which LT is performed.

  • seeds (List[str]) – list of seed nodes

cascade(g: python.graph.Graph, seeds: List[str]) → Tuple[List[List[str]], int][source]¶

Executes the LT diffusion process.

Parameters

  • g (Graph) – graph on which LT is performed.

  • seeds (List[str]) – list of seed nodes.

Returns

list of lists of influenced nodes as well as the total number of influenced nodes.

Return type

Tuple[List[List[str]], int]

static compute_influence_sum(froms: List[str], influences: Dict[str, float]) → float[source]¶

Computes the total sum of the influences of the seed nodes.

Parameters

  • froms (List[str]) – list of seed nodes.

  • influences (Dict[str,float]) – dictionary which entries (v, i) associate each node v to its influence value e.

Returns

the total sum of the influences of the seed nodes.

Return type

float

diffuse_all(g: python.graph.Graph, seed_nodes: List[str], influences: Dict[str, float], thresholds: Dict[str, float]) → Tuple[List[List[str]], int][source]¶

Executes the diffusion process until no more nodes can be influenced.

Parameters

  • g (Graph) – graph on which LT is performed.

  • seed_nodes (List[str]) – list of seed nodes.

  • influences (Dict[str, float]) – a dictionary which entries (v, i) associate each node v to its influence value e.

  • thresholds (Dict[str, float]) – a dictionary which entries (v, t) associate each node v to its threshold value t.

Returns

list of lists of influenced nodes as well as the total number of influenced nodes.

Return type

Tuple[List[List[str]], int]

diffuse_one_round(g: python.graph.Graph, seed_nodes: List[str], influences: Dict[str, float], thresholds: Dict[str, float]) → Tuple[List[str], List[str]][source]¶

Executes the diffusion process for one round.

Parameters

  • g (Graph) – graph on which LT is performed.

  • seed_nodes (List[str]) – list of seed nodes.

  • influences (Dict[str, float]) – dictionary which entries (v, i) associate each node v to its influence value e.

  • thresholds (Dict[str, float]) – dictionary which entries (v, t) associate each node v to its threshold value t.

Returns

The list of the new seed nodes as well as a list of the nodes that got influenced at the given round.

Return type

Tuple[List[str],List[str]]

get_influenced_nodes()[source]¶

Returns a list of all the influenced nodes at the end of the diffusion process.

Returns

list of influenced nodes.

Return type

List[List[str]]

get_total_number_of_influenced_nodes()[source]¶

Returns the total number of influenced nodes after carrying out the diffusion process.

Returns

number of influenced nodes.

Return type

int
